patterns.name: Good Defaults
patterns.description: Always pre-fill forms with the most likely values to reduce friction.

patterns.name: Input Feedback
patterns.description: Provide real-time validation (Success/Error/Warning) as the user types.

patterns.name: Inplace Editor
patterns.description: Allow users to edit content directly where it appears (Click-to-Edit).

patterns.name: Password Strength Meter
patterns.description: Visual indicator of password security to encourage stronger credentials.

patterns.name: Structured Format
patterns.description: Auto-format inputs (e.g., Phone numbers, Credit Cards) to prevent errors.

patterns.name: Forgiving Format
patterns.description: Accept various input formats (e.g., '1/2/2024' or 'Jan 2 2024') and normalize them.

patterns.name: Autosave
patterns.description: Prevent data loss by saving draft content automatically.

patterns.name: Undo
patterns.description: Allow users to reverse actions (e.g., 'Deleted', 'Archived') immediately.

patterns.name: Breadcrumbs
patterns.description: Show the trail of pages leading to the current location. Essential for deep hierarchies.

patterns.name: Fat Footer
patterns.description: Use the footer for secondary navigation, sitemaps, and resource links.

patterns.name: Tabs
patterns.description: Group related content into alternate views within the same context.

patterns.name: Accordion Menu
patterns.description: Vertically stacked list of headers that can be expanded/collapsed.

patterns.name: Shortcut Dropdown
patterns.description: Quick access menu for frequently used actions (e.g., User Profile menu).

patterns.name: Home Link
patterns.description: The logo must always link back to the dashboard or home page.

patterns.name: Wizard
patterns.description: Break complex tasks into a sequence of bite-sized steps.

patterns.name: Completeness Meter
patterns.description: Show a progress bar to gamify completion.

patterns.name: Steps Left
patterns.description: Clearly indicate how many steps remain in a Wizard process.

patterns.name: Inline Help Box
patterns.description: Specific contextual help (Tooltips or Info Icons) next to complex fields.

patterns.name: Cards
patterns.description: Container for actionable content. Must include: Image/Icon, Title, Summary, and Action.

patterns.name: Pagination
patterns.description: Divide large datasets into discrete pages for control.

patterns.name: Continuous Scrolling
patterns.description: Auto-load content as the user scrolls down (Best for feeds).

patterns.name: Adaptable View
patterns.description: Allow users to toggle between List View (Density) and Grid View (Visuals).

patterns.name: Empty States
patterns.description: Never show a blank page. Display illustration + 'Create New' CTA.

patterns.name: Vote To Promote
patterns.description: Allow community curation of content quality.

patterns.name: Flagging/Reporting
patterns.description: Mechanism for users to police bad content.

patterns.name: Rate Content
patterns.description: 5-star or Thumbs up/down systems.

patterns.name: Advanced Filter Bar
patterns.description: Collapsible or persistent bar with multi-select, date ranges, and boolean toggles for narrowing datasets.

patterns.name: Bulk Operations
patterns.description: Allow users to select multiple items and perform actions (Delete, Archive, Edit) in one click.

patterns.name: Audit Logging
patterns.description: Visual timeline of system/user events for security and transparency.

patterns.name: Permissions Simulator
patterns.description: Allow admins to preview the interface 'as' a specific role to verify access control.

patterns.name: Active Metric Cards
patterns.description: Summary boxes with Sparklines (line charts) and comparison indicators (e.g. +12% since last month).

patterns.name: Empty Contextual States
patterns.description: First-run experiences for specific modules like 'No API Keys' or 'No Logs Found'.

anti_patterns.name: Mystery Meat Navigation
anti_patterns.description: Links/Buttons that don't look clickable until hovered.

anti_patterns.name: Scroll Hijacking
anti_patterns.description: Altering the native scroll behavior of the browser.

anti_patterns.name: Pop-up Overload
anti_patterns.description: Using Modals for everything. Use 'Inline Editing' or 'Slide-overs' instead.
